titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the W. H. Frazee ledgers, 1896-1907

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Ann Mulfort January 2013

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

bioghist.head: Biography of W. H. Frazee
bioghist.p: Frazee operated "The Leader," a dry goods, clothing and furnishings store in Laramie, Wyoming.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Frazee's store ledgers contain accounts with wholesalers and Laramie residents.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on the materials for research purposes, and the collection is open to the public.

userestrict.head: Copyright Information
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for observing all copyright, property, and libel laws as they apply.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: There are no known other archival collections created by W. H. Frazee at the date of processing.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was received from Donald Lamb in 1952.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Finding aid encoded by Dinah Miles and D. Claudia Thompson in 2020.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Item Description, Box Number, Folder Number, Collection Name, Collection Number, American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming.

did.unittitle: Four large account books, kept by W. H. Frazee, Merchant:
Book 1: Begins on January 1, 1896. Contains accounts with some of the the leading cattle and sheepmen and citizens in the Laramie District. Including year 1898
Book 2: Begins on January 1, 1889 through 1901. Contains accounts with some of the leading cattle-sheep men, and commpanies of the Laramie district. Also many smaller accounts
Book 3: Begins on January 1, 1902, continued through 1904. W. J. Frazee Wholesale accounts, and accounts with cattle and sheep man and companies and many lesser accounts in the Laramie district
Book 4: Begins on January 1, 1905, continues through 1906 and into 1907. Contains accounts of cattle and sheep men, and companies, also lesser accounts
